title: Can you guys make a Chrome os version of lol?
body: Riot pls make a chrome os version of lol

replies.body:
Isn't the entire point of Chrome OS an easy and quick to boot web browser?

A better request would be that Riot make a linux adaptation of LoL.
why would you want a chrome os? so google can spy on your even easier?
Theres a Crome OS now? Must check it out!
They need to hurry up and do a Linux port for LoL, which would include Chrome OS. People have been asking for this since the game was released though...
